title: [K-12] Open-World Game-Based Computer Science Integration Training for Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Programming Concepts and Understanding of Instructional Methodologies
context.additional_context: Teacher training program applying gamification elements in a collaborative learning platform environment using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners complete three projects integrating computer science concepts into elementary curricula using open-world game design principles.
Learners develop five or more learner-centered educational scenarios through collaborative problem-solving with peer teachers.
Learners apply learning autonomy support strategies with 80% or higher accuracy when designing gamified instruction.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
